Using Direct CSS Properties


QueFlowJS allows you to directly apply CSS properties to your HTML elements within your template strings using the standard HTML attribute syntax. This provides a convenient way to style elements without requiring a separate stylesheet.

Here's a breakdown of how to use direct CSS properties in QueFlowJS:

  1. Use standard HTML attribute syntax for applying CSS properties directly to your elements.
  2. The attribute name should be the same as the CSS property name (e.g., `color`, `background-color`, `font-size`, etc.).
  3. The attribute value should be the desired CSS value (e.g., `red`, `#f0f0f0`, `16px`, etc.).
